Gokdo.com est accessible via une applica: Gokdo.com is accessible through a Google Play application or by visiting the website https://gokdo.com. It is a free gaming site with no purchase obligation.
Les joueurs reçoivent chaque jour 10 par:
Players receive 10 free games per day on the multiplayer game GoFRUITS.
10 additional games on GoFRUITS can be exchanged for 5 Rubies. The goal of the GoFRUITS game is to find the highest possible win. The game grid is regenerated once the highest win is found, and some squares in the GoFRUITS grid are losing squares.
Il faut 10 Rubis pour faire une partie s: It takes 10 Rubies to play a game on the Pool game. The multiplayer Pool game is 100% winning, there are no losing squares. The goal of the Pool game is to find the highest possible win. If the highest win is found, a new grid is generated.
Chaque mois, un concours est en place su: Every month, a contest is held on Gokdo for a predetermined period that can be modified at any time. Each contest offers prizes to the top 3000 players in the ranking and awards them with a prize, such as an Amazon gift card, PayPal transfer, Coins, Rubies, or Diamonds. Starting from the 3001st player, they won't win anything.
Les membres qui le désirent peuvent fair: Members who wish to do so can make a purchase via PayPal or credit card in the pack section of the site menu, which allows the purchase of additional Rubies. Gokdo remains a free gaming site with no purchase obligation.
Toute triche ou manipulation frauduleuse: Any cheating or fraudulent manipulation of the site or the game will result in the deletion of the member's account without notice or refund.
Une page de cadeau est disponible et pro: A gift page is available and offers gifts in exchange for Diamonds or Coins. The gifts are diverse and varied, classified by categories and prices. Orders are shipped within a maximum of 30 days. The webmaster may delete orders from players who have violated the rules.
Les joueurs peuvent contacter une fois p: Players can contact the Gokdo team once a day via the contact space located at the bottom of the page.
Des mails peuvent être envoyés par l'adm: Emails can be sent by the administrator to the member, and members can contact the webmaster to request the cessation of email communications.
Le jeu Events est présent chaque mois po: The Events game is available every month for a duration of 15 days on the Gokdo.com website. It is usually a multiplayer level-based game with a cumulative jackpot that allows you to win more Diamonds, Rubies, or Coins. You get one free game every day!
